description: Request for two pumps with following specifications
full_summary:
================

**Request for Proposal: Pump Unit, Centrifugal**

**Reference:** cb-8246-30766727

The Director General (Maritime Procurement) of the Department of National Defence is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Pump Unit, Centrifugal, in accordance with the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Items and Quantities:**

* Item 1: 6 units of Pump Unit, Centrifugal, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, with the following specifications:
	+ Part number: FF704100-0
	+ NCAGE: 05563
	+ Unit of issue: each
* Item 2: 6 units of Pump Unit, Centrifugal, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, with the following specifications:
	+ Part number: FF704100-0
	+ NCAGE: 05563
	+ Unit of issue: each

**Submission Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit their proposals in the English or French language.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* Equivalent or substitute products must be identified, including brand name, model, and/or part number, and NCAGE.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers regarding any procurement.

**Timeline:**

* Tender closing date: October 6, 2023, at 14:00 hours
* Expected contract start date: November 15, 2023
* Expected contract end date: March 29, 2024

**Contact Information:**

* Jean-Pierre Normandin, Director Maritime Procurement
* Email: [jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-3674

**Attachments:**

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8246/rfp-w8482-241767-b-en.pdf
